issue.title: [C++] Use decimal point-aware conversion from fast_float
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13536](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13536). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The vendored `fast_float` library recently added an option to change the decimal point, which we may reuse in the CSV converter instead of translating the input:
https://github.com/fastfloat/fast_float/pull/91
